member.summary: Adds an alarm channel.
member.param: The if of a digital input channel for the alarm.
The value of the channel, when the alarm should be active.

member.name: M:Kostal.Testman.Framework.Head.ApplicationAlarmController.AddIndicationChannel(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds an indication channel.
member.param: The if of a digital input channel for the indication.
The value of the channel, when the indication should be active.
The text that id displayed, if the indication channel is active (will be translated by inner functionality).

member.returns: Returns true, if seccessful otherwise false.

member.summary: Finds the last job, that is specified by key-value-combination for an attribute.

member.name: M:Kostal.Testman.Framework.Head.UserPrompt.WaitForResponse(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Waits for response on this prompt for a maximum time (in milliseconds). Blocks the current thread until the response or the timeout occur.
